Quick tips to get started.
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Welcome to the Events Calendar Pro family! 👋

Ready to dive in and create a beautiful, professional calendar? Here are four ways to get started.

(But first, if you haven't already set up The Events Calendar, check out our getting started guide and configure your basic settings.)
Create recurring events
Same time and easily set up repeating events.
Build venue and organizer pages
Give events context with custom venues and organizers.
Set up your Google Maps API key.
Check out our Google Maps troubleshooting guide for help.
Get to know widgets and shortcodes
Embed calendar widgets anywhere on your site using shortcodes.
Resources
Visit the Knowledgebase
Contact our support
team
Find tutorials and explainers
Rock on,
The Events Calendar Team 🤘
